data.title: So Random!
data.meta_description: So Random has the biggest cast, the biggest stars, and the biggest laughs on Disney Channel! Nothing is off limits in this all new musical sketch comeâ¦
data.text:
EPISODE 1

Cody Simpson - June 5, 2011

Check out Celebrity Wheel of Fortune and Zombie Man on So Random with musical guest Cody Simpson!

22 min Â· Jun 5, 2011 TV-G

EPISODE 2

Greyson Chance - June 12, 2011

Check out Footy Scent's hit 'Socks with Sandals' and Jack Sparrow's newest adventures!

22 min Â· Jun 12, 2011 TV-G

EPISODE 3

Selena Gomez - June 19, 2011

Check out M.C. Grammar and the Sag Down Smackdown! Selena Gomez performs 'Who Says.'

22 min Â· Jun 19, 2011 TV-G

EPISODE 4

Mitchel Musso - June 25, 2011

Strawberry Shortbread defends Strawberry Land and Pete applies Guac-A-Mole to his mole! Plus, Mitchel Musso performs "Get Away."

21 min Â· Jun 25, 2011 TV-G

EPISODE 5

Tony Hawk - July 10, 2011

Special guest Tony Hawk hosts So Random! Lori Bedletter hosts Let's Touch Animals with her hook hands and Lunch Ladies bring cafeteria food to your home over summer break!

22 min Â· Jul 10, 2011 TV-G
